Package co.decodable.sdk.pipeline

Interface DecodableStreamSink<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The data type of this stream
All Superinterfaces:
Serializable, org.apache.flink.api.connector.sink2.Sink<T>, org.apache.flink.api.connector.sink2.StatefulSink<T,DecodableWriterState>, org.apache.flink.api.connector.sink2.TwoPhaseCommittingSink<T,DecodableCommittable>
public interface DecodableStreamSink<T> extends org.apache.flink.api.connector.sink2.StatefulSink<T,DecodableWriterState>, org.apache.flink.api.connector.sink2.TwoPhaseCommittingSink<T,DecodableCommittable>
A StatefulSink which allows to write to a Decodable stream from within a Flink job.
